name: Shoot for the Top!
description:
In Shoot for the Top, you play as a jogger who must dodge obstacles and collect coins as they make your way through the neighborhood and outer space, while listening to the smash hit work-out song "Shoot for the Top."

Dodge obstacles and pick up coins, stars and hearts to increase your score.

Up/Down/Left/Right on keyboard to move.

Refresh page to restart if you finish or run out of hearts.
